advancements.husbandry.steel_hoe.descrip: Use a steel ingot to upgrade a hoe, then reevalute your life choices
advancements.husbandry.steel_hoe.title: Too Dedicated
pack.toolsofsteel.visual_tweaks.name: Tools of Steel: Diamond Tweaks
pack.toolsofsteel.visual_tweaks.descript: Diamond tools, now with a steel flair!
pack.toolsofsteel.consistent_helms.name: Tools of Steel: The Knows Nose
pack.toolsofsteel.consistent_helms.descr: Removes the nose guard from helmet items.
toolsofsteel.midnightconfig.title: 'Tools of Steel' Config
toolsofsteel.midnightconfig.remove_tweak: Prevents the respective built-in resource pack from loading. (Restart Required)
toolsofsteel.midnightconfig.remove_knows: Prevents the respective built-in resource pack from loading. (Restart Required)
toolsofsteel.midnightconfig.remove_durab: (NOT RECOMMENDED) Stops the mod from altering Diamond and Netherite tool durability. (Restart Required)
toolsofsteel.midnightconfig.remove_repai: (NOT RECOMMENDED) Stops the mod from forcing vanilla Diamond equipment repair to use Diamond Ingots instead of Diamonds. (Restart Required)
toolsofsteel.midnightconfig.bypass_crash: DO NOT ask for support if something goes wrong!
